summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1995, for the improvement of Whitman Avenue, from North 59th Street to North 62nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 20400 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
